        Parameters:
        code - Course-code for Virtual Program
        Cat - Category of Virtual Program
        pd - PD status of Virtual Program
        q - Quota of the Virtual Program

      • filter

        public java.util.ArrayList<Candidate> filter()
        filters the applicants
        Adds all the applications to waitlisted, Sorts the waitlisted as per their rank in merit list
        Takes the top applications
        Used for Gale Shapley Algo
        Returns:
        Returns the rejected list of candidates
